markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Witchcraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=5101) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 222 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Witch](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=217)

**Prerequisites**
[Witch Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5099)

</column>

---

You gain a 1st- or 2nd-level [witch feat](/Feats.aspx?Traits=323) of your choice. You can select three familiar abilities for your familiar each day, instead of two.

<title level="2">Basic Witchcraft leads to...</title>
[Advanced Witchcraft](/Feats.aspx?ID=5102)
name: Basic Witchcraft
